title: Tested: Arc Pulse delivers an elegant and ultra-minimal titanium iPhone 13 case
content:
Earlier this year, the new Arc Pulse case launched to give iPhone 13 owners a sleek alternative to not rocking a cover at all. Wrapping your handset in an ultra-minimal form-factor, its high-end titanium build offers added protection without all of the usual bulk. But is the premium build worth a fittingly steep price tag? Our latest Tested with 9to5Toys review is on the case.

moreâ€¦

The post Tested: Arc Pulse delivers an elegant and ultra-minimal titanium iPhone 13 case appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Arc Pulse iPhone 13 case delivers an elegant way to protect your handset in an utterly unique and minimal titanium form-factor.
